data.comment: Today's referee, Daniel Siebert, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Leipzig.
In the minute 2, Leipzig's Yussuf Poulsen breaks free at Borussia-Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Leipzig.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Daniel Siebert signals a Leipzig throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 5, M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Daniel Siebert awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Yussuf Poulsen gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leipzig.
In the minute 10, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Leipzig push forward at Borussia-Park and Alexander Sorloth gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the M´gladbach defence.
M´gladbach are caught offside.
In the minute 11, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Leipzig.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In Monchengladbach, M´gladbach push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 16, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Leipzig at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Dani Olmo fires in a strike for Leipzig.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 24, Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Daniel Siebert signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Daniel Siebert awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leipzig have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 32, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 35, Leipzig are whistled for offside.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Dani Olmo (Leipzig) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Leipzig.
At Borussia-Park, M´gladbach are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Leipzig at Borussia-Park.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
M´gladbach drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Daniel Siebert signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of M´gladbach.
In Monchengladbach Leipzig attack through Lazar Samardzic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Daniel Siebert blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Throw-in Leipzig.
In the minute 46, Oscar Wendt is on a sub for Nico Elvedi for M´gladbach.
In the minute 47, Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniel Siebert signals a throw-in for Leipzig, close to M´gladbach's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, In Monchengladbach M´gladbach drive forward through Alassane Plea. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Daniel Siebert waits before resuming play because Breel Embolo for M´gladbach is still down.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Breel Embolo for M´gladbach is back on the field again.
In the minute 51, Oscar Wendt (M´gladbach) has received a yellow card from Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 52, Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Borussia-Park.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 54, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
M´gladbach pushes forward through Alassane Plea, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
M´gladbach's Florian Neuhaus has been booked in Monchengladbach.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 58, Leipzig surge into the attack at Borussia-Park but Alexander Sorloth’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Goal! M´gladbach have got their heads in front thanks to a Hannes Wolf strike.
In the minute 60, That's a fine assist from Patrick Herrmann.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
At Borussia-Park, Kevin Kampl has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 62, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
M´gladbach are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 66, Leipzig's Marcel Sabitzer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Hee-chan Hwang is replacing Yussuf Poulsen for the away team.
In the minute 66, Leipzig make their second substitution with Emil Forsberg replacing Dani Olmo.
Julian Nagelsmann (Leipzig) is making a third substitution, with Amadou Haidara replacing Kevin Kampl.
Alassane Plea (M´gladbach) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 67, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Hee-chan Hwang for Leipzig has been booked by Daniel Siebert and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 70, The away team replace Lazar Samardzic with Christopher Nkunku.
At Borussia-Park, Marcel Sabitzer has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 71, Leipzig's Hee-chan Hwang gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Leipzig drives forward and Amadou Haidara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Florian Neuhaus with Christoph Kramer.
Marcus Thuram is replacing Breel Embolo for the home team.
Leipzig's Alexander Sorloth gets in a shot on goal at Borussia-Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Daniel Siebert awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Emil Forsberg (Leipzig) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 76, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Leipzig drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Daniel Siebert signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Lars Stindl is on a sub for Alassane Plea for M´gladbach.
In the minute 80, M´gladbach make their fifth substitution with Valentino Lazaro replacing Patrick Herrmann.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 83, Leipzig push forward at Borussia-Park and Alexander Sorloth gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined M´gladbach defence.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Leipzig's Alexander Sorloth attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 83, M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 85, Leipzig to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Leipzig.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hee-chan Hwang (Leipzig) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Daniel Siebert awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Monchengladbach.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Christopher Nkunku (Leipzig) has received a yellow card from Daniel Siebert.
